channel.title: Truly Interesting
channel.description: Truly Interesting is a podcasts started by Noah Roger in 2020. Released every Friday starting Friday 3rd January 2020, it will give a humourus and detailed analysis into intriguing topics which may relate to Current News Events or it may be just something I thought of which turns out to be interesting.
channel.itunes:author: Noah Roger

item.title: Help Me Out
item.description: You can suggest topics to me by emailing trulyinteresting@noger.co.uk
